welcome.title: Welcome to Reflecto! üéâ
welcome.description: Your personal AI diary that helps you better understand yourself and your thoughts. Let's explore the main features!

entries.title: Write down your thoughts ‚úçÔ∏è
entries.description: Add entries about your day, emotions, plans, or reflections. Use voice input for quick entry creation. For example: "Today was a productive day - completed an important project and feel satisfied with the work done."

summary.title: AI analyzes your entries üß†
summary.description: Our AI creates smart summaries: daily from your entries, weekly from daily summaries, monthly from weekly summaries, and yearly from monthly summaries. This helps you see patterns and trends in your life!

security.title: Your data is secure üîí
security.description: All your entries and summaries are encrypted with your credentials. Data is stored encrypted in the database - only you can read it. Your privacy is our priority!

start.title: Ready to start? üöÄ
start.description: Great! Now you know all the main features of Reflecto. Create your first entry and start your journey to better self-understanding!
